actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey land to the town of Thompson, Connecticut, for fire fighting and emergency services purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey, without consideration, specified land located in the West Thompson Lake project area to the town of Thompson, Connecticut, for use for fire fighting and related emergency services purposes.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey land to the town of Thompson, Connecticut, for fire fighting and emergency services purposes.
